About Us
Welcome to 7 West Taphouse, where the art of craft beer and mouthwatering cuisine come together to create an unforgettable dining experience. With three bustling locations in Superior, WI, Duluth, MN, and St. Cloud, MN, we're proud to be your go-to destination for beer aficionados and food enthusiasts alike.
Our Passion for Craft Beer
At 7 West Taphouse, we take our beer seriously. With over 50 rotating taps of craft and traditional favorite beers, our commitment to serving the finest brews knows no bounds. Whether you're a seasoned beer connoisseur or just beginning your journey into the world of craft beer, our extensive selection promises something to tickle your taste buds. Our ever-changing beer menu ensures there's always something new and exciting to try, making each visit a unique adventure.
Classic Culinary Delights
Prepare your taste buds for a one-of-a-kind experience with our signature burgers. Crafted with love and creativity, our burgers are a true delight for your senses. Each bite is a harmonious blend of juicy, flavorful beef, creating a culinary masterpiece that's exclusive to 7 West Taphouse.
More Than Burgers
While our burgers are the stars of the show, we understand that variety is the spice of life. That's why we offer a diverse menu featuring an array of options to satisfy every palate. From fresh and crisp salads bursting with locally sourced ingredients to hearty wraps filled with savory goodness, our menu is designed to cater to all tastes. And of course, no visit is complete without indulging in our favorite bar appetizers that pair perfectly with your chosen brew.
Our Locations
Superior, WI:
Our Superior location offers a warm and welcoming atmosphere, perfect for relaxing with friends and family after a long day.
Duluth, MN:
Nestled in the heart of Duluth, our restaurant is a go-to spot for locals and visitors alike. Join us for stunning views and unbeatable brews.
St. Cloud, MN:
In the heart of St. Cloud, we're proud to be a hub for beer enthusiasts and food lovers alike. Our welcoming ambiance makes every visit a memorable one.
At 7 West, we're more than just a restaurant; we're a community of beer enthusiasts and foodies who are passionate about delivering exceptional experiences. Join us for a taste of the extraordinary, where every dish and every beer is crafted with care and precision.
Come on in, raise a glass, and savor the flavors of 7 West Taphouse! Your home for craft beer, culinary innovation, and unforgettable memories. Cheers to good times and great brews!
